column2: T1 -- Appeared 1st @ nape of neck and responded to therapy but never vanished completely
T2 -- Appeared 2nd on top of skull and showed no response to therapy
Sac'd due to T2 size and lethargy
No but lymph nodes adjacent to lungs were very large
1 cryo for T1, 2 cryos for T2
Cell lines attempted for T1 and T2
